import React, { Component } from 'react' import { gql, useQuery } from '@apollo/client' import { data } from 'autoprefixer' import classes from './cart.module.css'; import AllProducts from './AllProducts'; const selectedProduct = gql ` query { product (id:"huarache-x-stussy-le") { name brand description gallery } } ` const Cart = () => { const {data, loading} = useQuery(selectedProduct) console.log(data) if (loading) return 'loading...' return (

{data.product.name}

Size

XS S M L
) } export default Cart
